text:
On 12/28/2024 at 05:55 PM, Robert Moyer wrote:
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/28/2024 at 07:55 PM)
Subject:Thursday
Is there a reason I can’t see Adrian longer on Thursday since he is out of school? It seems like a particularly good time to take advantage of the
schedule. Please let me know what the issue is. Thanks.
Message 282 of 287
So for the holiday I got less time than the regular schedule? How does that work? I banked Friday, so why don’t I use some of that time? Please stop
making things up. It’s gone on for 26 years.
Sent:12/28/2024 at 08:02 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/29/2024 at 07:18 AM)
Subject:Re: Thursday
On 12/28/2024 at 08:00 PM, Christine Moyer wrote:
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/28/2024 at 08:00 PM)
Subject:Re: Thursday
The schedule is for kids to be with me this entire winter break.
This Saturday and next Thursday are actually not part of the schedule.
Your continued angry and aggressive tone with me over these comms is scary.
I’m stepping away.
On 12/28/2024 at 05:55 PM, Robert Moyer wrote:
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/28/2024 at 07:55 PM)
Subject:Thursday
Is there a reason I can’t see Adrian longer on Thursday since he is out of school? It seems like a particularly good time to take advantage of the
schedule. Please let me know what the issue is. Thanks.
Message 283 of 287
I’m done with your aggression.
You have been in violation of the requirements for sober link in the parenting plan which means visitations stop until court order.
Holiday schedule is also dictated by the parenting plan.
I am stopping all communication in OFW and will wait for comms between the lawyers.
Sent:12/29/2024 at 07:22 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/29/2024 at 07:35 AM)
Subject:Re: Thursday
